newTasks.title: Implement Enhanced Hero Section
newTasks.description: Create a visually stunning hero section with gradients, decorative elements, and clear user journey guidance.
newTasks.details:
Transform the current basic hero section into a visually stunning centerpiece that immediately captures attention and guides users based on their experience level. This section will establish the visual tone for the entire redesign.

Key Features to Implement:
- Multiple gradient backgrounds for visual depth
- Decorative elements with subtle animations
- Clear value proposition messaging
- Dual-purpose CTA buttons for different user types
- Quick stats showcase with icons
- Mobile-responsive design with proper scaling
- Typography hierarchy that guides the eye
- Accessibility considerations for all interactive elements
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify the hero section displays correctly across all device sizes. Test CTA button functionality and ensure they lead to appropriate destinations. Validate that animations perform smoothly without causing performance issues. Check accessibility with screen readers and keyboard navigation. Ensure the section loads quickly and doesn't impact page performance.

subtasks.title: Get User Approval for Hero Section Design
subtasks.description: Present the proposed hero section design to the user for review and approval before proceeding with implementation.
subtasks.details:
Before implementing any code changes, present the detailed design concept to the user:

1. Show the visual mockup/description of the enhanced hero section
2. Explain the design decisions and how they improve user experience
3. Highlight the key features being added
4. Get explicit approval to proceed with implementation
5. Address any concerns or requested modifications

Only proceed to implementation subtasks after receiving user approval.

newTasks.title: Implement User Journey Navigation Section
newTasks.description: Create the 'Choose Your Path' section that guides users based on their experience level and needs.
newTasks.details:
Implement the user journey navigation that helps both new and experienced users find the right starting point. This section bridges the gap between the hero and specific content access.

Key Features to Implement:
- Priority sections (Getting Started, Player Resources, Judge Resources)
- Secondary sections (By Book, Advanced Play)
- Card-based layout with visual hierarchy
- Feature lists for each journey type
- Responsive grid that adapts to screen size
- Hover effects and interactive feedback
- Clear visual distinction between priority levels
newTasks.testStrategy: Test navigation paths to ensure they lead to appropriate content. Verify responsive behavior across device sizes. Check hover states and interactions. Validate that the visual hierarchy guides users effectively. Test with both new and experienced users to ensure the paths make sense.
